content: My regrets -- I will need to miss tomorrow's call.
We'll be booking sessions for the WGM - any preferences/topics you want covered?
I'm hoping we'll have a good set of SMART Web Messaging reconciliation done by the WGM, so if we find ourselves with time, having a quarter focused on that would be great. (FYI @Carl Anderson)
Do you have a preferred time-slot @Josh Mandel ?
Not exactly; too many unknowns, so I think the best thing to do is pick time slots not by topic but based on general availability so that we can be more flexible with topics if needed.
Ok. Do you have any particular availability limitations?
We also might want time together with #Security and Privacy to talk about release plans / scope for the SMART v2 guide (targeting May ballot)
